game.title: Rocket Doge
game.description:
Every Doge has its day!
In Rocket Doge, the well known and popular Doge is outfitted with a rocket. Take control of Doge and pick up Doge coins while avoiding the numerous enemies that is trying to stop you. Rocket Doge is an addictive, just-one-more-go game that has been well received since its launch. The game is free and available now for iPhone and iPod. It will be available for iPad later this week.

trailer.name: This video showcases the addictive gameplay found in Rocket Doge

features.feature: Pick up and play in seconds
